programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Pacific Division champion Golden Knights host the Oilers for Game 1 of their Western Conference semifinal. Vegas ousted Edmonton in six games during the second round of the 2023 playoffs. The clubs split four meetings in the regular season.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Golden Knights host the Oilers for Game 2 of their Western Conference semifinal series. Edmonton scored three times in the third period of Game 1 en route to a 4-2 victory. Oilers star Connor McDavid has 13 points in seven postseason contests.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Vegas Golden Knights at Edmonton Oilers
programme.sub-title: Vegas Golden Knights at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Golden Knights and Oilers shift their West semifinal to Canada for Game 3. After Vegas launched a comeback to force Game 2 to overtime, Edmonton captain Connor McDavid fed fellow star Leon Draisaitl for the 5-4 winner and a 2-0 series lead.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Vegas Golden Knights at Edmonton Oilers
programme.sub-title: Vegas Golden Knights at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Golden Knights aim to draw level with the Oilers in Game 4 of their West semifinal. Reilly Smith's wide-angle goal off Leon Draisaitl's stick with 0.4 seconds left on the clock stunned the Edmonton faithful in Game 3, giving Vegas a 4-3 victory.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Oilers try to advance in Game 5 of their second-round series against the Golden Knights. Edmonton pushed Vegas to the brink by cruising to a 3-0 decision in Game 4. Edmonton seeks a third trip to the Western Conference finals in four seasons.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at Washington Capitals
programme.desc: The Capitals and Hurricanes collide in Game 1 of their East semifinal series. Both defeated their first-round foes in five games, as Washington dusted Montreal, and Carolina crushed New Jersey. The Caps beat the Canes on April 10 to clinch home ice.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at Washington Capitals
programme.desc: The Hurricanes aim for a firm grip on their East semifinal, up 1-0 entering Game 2 against the Capitals. Stalwart Carolina defenseman Jaccob Slavin snapped home the winning goal 3:06 into overtime for a 2-1 victory in Game 1 over Washington.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Washington Capitals at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes head home for Game 3 of their tied East semifinal against the Capitals. Connor McMichael's fourth goal of the postseason opened the scoring for Washington en route to a 3-1 victory in Game 2 after Carolina stole home ice in the opener.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Washington Capitals at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes and Capitals play Game 4 of their Eastern Conference semifinal. Frederik Andersen notched his fourth career postseason shutout in Game 3, helping Carolina to a 4-0 win and a 2-1 series lead. The Canes are 4-0 at home in these playoffs.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at Washington Capitals
programme.desc: The Hurricanes try to close out the Capitals in Game 5 of their East semifinal. Carolina seized a 3-1 series lead with a 5-2 victory in Game 4. Hurricanes goalie Frederik Andersen is allowing 1.41 goals per playoff game with a .935 save percentage.
